== Information ==

  
==== requires: ====
  * Python 2.6+
  * Linux 2.6.x
    
    
==== functions: ====
  * cpu_times()
  * cpu_percents(sample_duration=1)
  * procs_running()
  * procs_blocked()
  * load_avg()
  * cpu_info()
    
    
==== simple example: ====
{{{    
#!/usr/bin/env python
from linux_metrics import cpu_stat

print cpu_stat.procs_running()
print cpu_stat.cpu_info()
}}}
